summary:
We know best foods can make the people’s face smile and healthy that’s why we are here to make world’s best products for your consumers to make you healthy and wealthy. We welcome you toVARSHA GROUP and would like to introduce ourselves as follows:
 
Varsha Industries Pvt. Ltd. was established in 1998 in Junagadh, (India) and is one of the leading Manufacturer and Exporter of Peanuts, Sesame, Spices, and more.
 
We have certified with US FDA & ISO 22000:2005 - HACCP System Company. We are also certified with HALAL INDIA.
 
You can visit our website www.varshaindustries.co.in to see our complete range of products
 
PRODUCTS WE OFFER ARE AS FOLLOWS:
PEANUTS ( KERNELS, INSHELL, BLANCHED)
SESAME (NATURAL, BLACK, HULLED)
CUMIN, CORIANDER , TURMERIC AND OTHER SPICES
SPICES & CONDIMENTS (DRIED VEGETABLES ONION,GARLIC GINGER ETC)
 
WHY CHOOSE VARSHA INDUSTRIES LTD.?
Consistent Quality
Price competitive & on time delivery is the main motto of our firm.
ISO 22000 certified (food and safety Management)
Quality As per International standard (U.S.A & EUROPE Specific)
The first Indian company having FULLY AUTOMATIC PLANT for Manufacturing in India.
Production capacity 10000 MT PER annum ( Groundnuts, Sesame & Spices)
Exports More than 40 country (Universally accepted)
We have our own Laboratory Facilities to pass each and every Lot of Manufactured Goods with strict inspection.
Member of international councils (ASTA, APEDA, SPICES BOARD, GUJARAT CHAMBER, NAFED, HALAL, US-FDA)
 www.varshaindustries.co.in

treasury_media.title: Varsha Industries Pvt. Ltd. - Exporter of spices, nuts and grains
treasury_media.description: Welcome to Varsha Industries Pvt. Ltd. (Formally Varsha Proteins) is an APEDA, IOPEPC, ISOQR: ISO 22000:2005, EXPORT HOUSE Certified Company, Manufacturer and Exporter of Nutritious Cereals, Spices & Condiments and Cooking Oils, Gujarat, India.

profile_positions.description:
• Receive enquiries, acknowledge them immediately and record them appropriately.
• Categorize sales enquiries for immediate action i.e. for discussing with the sales team, for future reference, etc. 
• Obtain quotations and send proforma to customers.
• Prepare purchase orders in consultation with the sales team.
• Coordinate between production team and customers for processing sales orders.
• Coordinate with the logistics team to ensure timely delivery of orders.
• Follow-up for the payment from customers.
• Liaise with logistics team and update availability of stocks, maintain re-order levels.
• Update sales managers on the status of orders, issues and stock levels.
• Keep a tab on product expiry dates and bring it to the notice of seniors for further action.
• Arrange to send samples as and when required, receive feedback on the evaluation.
• Respond to customer complaints and escalate sensitive issues to seniors.
